level.heading: Human Rights Act compliance.
level.text: Each franchise agreement shall comply with ยง 2-1402.67.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 10 of Digital Inclusion Emergency Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-467, July 25, 2006, 53 DCR 6754).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 16-210, see notes following ยง 34-1731.01.
